creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; soldier running on the deck of a ship dressed in a black uniform; two small explosions in LRQ of image and in right center image; large plumes of white smoke throughout image; black smoke in top center of image, with brown bits of debris in top center of image and in center left image
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: 12082071 ROW
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with mica
title: God of War, Our Naval Commander Hirose Takeo
